title: [LOADING SCREEN CRASH]
body: Hi, im having trouble getting into games on league after i select my champion. Whenever champ select is over my loading screen is black and crashes or loads to 50% then crashes! Please help. Im on an imac if that helps.

replies.body:
It sounds like your network could be having a hard time connecting to the game server. Your game starts to load the match, but without a stable connection it gets hung up somewhere and can't finish loading everything. 

Look over our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some ways you can be sure you keep a stable connection throughout the game.
